nodes.text: The Kamperdine custom tailored armored jacket was a valuable brand of custom tailored jacket produced by Kamperdine Clothing Specialists.

Custom tailored to practically any species that wore clothing, a Kamperdine armored jacket could be crafted from the skin of nearly any known creature in the galaxy, with no two jackets being alike. Sought after by military and government officials, politicians, and other galactic VIP, Kamperdine jackets were rarely found on the open market, and had to be ordered directly from Kamperdine months in advance. Stylish and rugged, the Kamperdine armored jacket possessed impressive armor capabilities in addition to being a sign that its wearer had impeccable taste.
